definition: to offer a sacrifice to (gods or ancestors)/memorial ceremony/(in classical novels) to recite an incantation to activate a magic weapon/(lit. and fig.) to wield

sentences.english: Arius: That man is going to bring the ARCANA shortly.
sentences.chinese: 那男人很快就要將阿卡那祭器帶來。

sentences.english: Matier: It seemed that you obtained the final ARCANA.
sentences.chinese: 看來你找到最後的阿卡那祭器了。

sentences.english: Big drum is a kind of Jino sacred sacrificial utensil and musical instrument.
sentences.chinese: 大鼓是基諾族神聖的祭器和樂器。

definition: ancient bronze food vessel with a round mouth and two or four handles/round basket of bamboo
to offer sacrifices to the gods or ancestors
to offer sacrifices to the gods
to host a banquet/feast/banquet/ceremony of sacrifice

pair of annual sacrificial ceremonies held by the emperor in ancient times: one in the southern suburbs of the capital (bringing offerings to Heaven) and another in the northern suburbs (with offerings to Earth)
